info.description:
The Ed-Fi ODS / API enables applications to read and write education data stored in an Ed-Fi ODS through a secure REST interface. 
***
 > *Note: Consumers of ODS / API information should sanitize all data for display and storage. The ODS / API provides reasonable safeguards against cross-site scripting attacks and other malicious content, but the platform does not and cannot guarantee that the data it contains is free of all potentially harmful content.* 
***
info.title: Ed-Fi API (SaaS - Core + TPDM Light)

oauth2_client_credentials.description: Ed-Fi ODS/API OAuth 2.0 Client Credentials Grant Type authorization

get.summary: Gets the change versions for the earliest (oldest) and most recent (newest) changes available.

401.description: Unauthorized.  The request requires authentication.  The OAuth bearer token was either not provided or is invalid.  The operation may succeed once authenication has been successfully completed.

403.description: Forbidden.  The request cannot be completed in the current authorization context.  Contact your administrator if you believe this operation should be allowed.

404.description: Not Found.  An attempt to connect to the database snapshot, enabled by the Use-Snapshot header, was unsuccessful (indicating the snapshot may have been removed).

500.description: An unhandled error occurred on the server. See the response body for details.
